scripts.lint-fix: yarn tsc --noEmit && yarn eslint . --fix && yarn prettier --write .
scripts.precommit: if [[ -n $(git ls-files . --exclude-standard --others --modified) ]]; then echo "Aborting due to unstaged changes"; exit 1; fi; (yarn run check-fix && git add -A)
scripts.preinstall: node -e "if(process.env.npm_execpath.indexOf('yarn') === -1) throw new Error('You must use Yarn to install, not NPM')"
